title: Use only the uploaded logo across the portal

requirements.text: Add the newly uploaded logo image file (SmartSelect_20260214-130511_WhatsApp-1.jpg) to the frontend static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and treat it as the single source-of-truth logo asset.
acceptanceCriteria: The file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/SmartSelect_20260214-130511_WhatsApp-1.jpg in the build output.
No additional derived/resized/generated logo files are required for runtime rendering.

requirements.text: Update the public portal UI to use only /assets/generated/SmartSelect_20260214-130511_WhatsApp-1.jpg anywhere a TT/Tactic Transmit logo is rendered (including the fixed header brand mark and the Home hero logo), removing references to any other logo image filenames currently used.
acceptanceCriteria: A repo-wide search shows no remaining references to previous logo filenames (e.g., /assets/generated/tt-logo-user.dim_*.png or other TT logo renders).
The site renders without broken-image placeholders on all routes (Home, Product, Board, Connect, Admin, Terms, Privacy, Legal Docs).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the backend single-actor architecture unchanged; no backend changes are required for this request.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Redesigning layout, typography, animations, or navigation behavior beyond what is necessary to swap the logo asset.
Creating or generating new logo variants (PNG/SVG) or additional sizes derived from the upload.
